00061 void X_PrintStackTrace() {
00062 
00063         const size_t max_depth = 100;
00064 
00065         size_t stack_depth;
00066         void *stack_addrs[max_depth];
00067         char **stack_strings;
00068 
00069         stack_depth = backtrace(stack_addrs, max_depth);
00070         stack_strings = backtrace_symbols(stack_addrs, stack_depth);
00071 
00072         printf("stack trace \n");
00073 
00074         for (size_t index = 1; index < stack_depth; index++) {
00075                 printf("   %s\n", stack_strings[index]);
00076         }
00077 
00078         free(stack_strings);
00079 
00080 }
00081 #else
00082 
00083 void X_PrintStackTrace() {
00084         // TODO
00085 }
00086 
00087 #endif

00184 // custom class for struct linger conversion
00185 jobject UDT_NewLingerUDT( //
00186                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00187                 linger * const lingerValue //
00188                 ) {
00189         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00190         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(lingerValue, "lingerValue");
00191         int value;
00192         if (lingerValue->l_onoff == 0) {
00193                 value = 0;
00194         } else {
00195                 value = lingerValue->l_linger;
00196         }
00197         jobject objLinger = env->NewObject(udt_clsLingerUDT,
00198                         udt_clsLingerUDT_initID, (jint) value);
00199         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objLinger, "objLinger");
00200         return objLinger;
00201 }

00203 // java wrapper exception error codes; keep in sync with ErrorUDT.java
00204 #define UDT_WRAPPER_UNKNOWN -1 // WRAPPER_UNKNOWN(-1, "unknown error code"), //
00205 #define UDT_WRAPPER_UNIMPLEMENTED -2 // WRAPPER_UNIMPLEMENTED(-2, "this feature is not yet implemented"), //
00206 #define UDT_WRAPPER_MESSAGE -3 // WRAPPER_MESSAGE(-3, "wrapper generated error"), //
00207 #define UDT_USER_DEFINED_MESSAGE -4 // USER_DEFINED_MESSAGE(-4, "user defined message"), //
00208 //

00210 // NOTE: socket id stored in java object SocketUDT
00211 jint UDT_GetSocketID( //
00212                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00213                 const jobject self //
00214                 ) {
00215         return env->GetIntField(self, udts_SocketID);
00216 }
00217 // NOTE: socket id stored in java object SocketUDT
00218 void UDT_SetSocketID( //
00219                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00220                 const jobject self, //
00221                 const jint socketID //
00222                 ) {
00223         env->SetIntField(self, udts_SocketID, socketID);
00224 }

00226 jthrowable UDT_NewExceptionUDT( //
00227                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00228                 const jint socketID, //
00229                 const jint errorCode, //
00230                 const char* message //
00231                 ) {
00232         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(env, "env");
00233         const jstring messageString = env->NewStringUTF(message);
00234         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(messageString, "messageString");
00235         const jobject exception = env->NewObject(udt_clsExceptionUDT,
00236                         udt_clsExceptionUDT_initID0, socketID, errorCode, messageString);
00237         return static_cast<jthrowable>(exception);
00238 }
00239 
00240 void UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message( //
00241                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00242                 const jint socketID, //
00243                 const char *comment //
00244                 ) {
00245         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(env, "env");
00246         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(comment, "comment");
00247         const jint code = UDT_WRAPPER_MESSAGE;
00248         const jthrowable exception = UDT_NewExceptionUDT(env, socketID, code,
00249                         comment);
00250         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(exception, "exception");
00251         env->Throw(exception);
00252 }
00253 
00254 // socketID == 0 means not applicable / not known id
00255 void UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00256                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00257                 const jint socketID, //
00258                 const char* comment, //
00259                 UDT::ERRORINFO * const errorInfo //
00260                 ) {
00261         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(env, "env");
00262         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(comment, "comment");
00263         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(errorInfo, "errorInfo");
00264         const jint code = errorInfo->getErrorCode();
00265         const jthrowable exception = //
00266                         UDT_NewExceptionUDT(env, socketID, code, comment);
00267         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(exception, "exception");
00268         env->Throw(exception);
00269 }

00271 void UDT_InitFieldMonitor( //
00272                 JNIEnv * const env //
00273                 ) {
00274 
00275         const jclass cls = udt_clsMonitorUDT;
00276 
00277         // global measurements
00278         udtm_msTimeStamp = env->GetFieldID(cls, "msTimeStamp", "J"); // time since the UDT entity is started, in milliseconds
00279         udtm_pktSentTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentTotal", "J"); // total number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
00280         udtm_pktRecvTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvTotal", "J"); // total number of received packets
00281         udtm_pktSndLossTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSndLossTotal", "I"); // total number of lost packets (sender side)
00282         udtm_pktRcvLossTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRcvLossTotal", "I"); // total number of lost packets (receiver side)
00283         udtm_pktRetransTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRetransTotal", "I"); // total number of retransmitted packets
00284         udtm_pktSentACKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentACKTotal", "I"); // total number of sent ACK packets
00285         udtm_pktRecvACKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvACKTotal", "I"); // total number of received ACK packets
00286         udtm_pktSentNAKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentNAKTotal", "I"); // total number of sent NAK packets
00287         udtm_pktRecvNAKTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvNAKTotal", "I"); // total number of received NAK packets
00288         udtm_usSndDurationTotal = env->GetFieldID(cls, "usSndDurationTotal", "J"); // total time duration when UDT is sending data (idle time exclusive)
00289 
00290         // local measurements
00291         udtm_pktSent = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSent", "J"); // number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
00292         udtm_pktRecv = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecv", "J"); // number of received packets
00293         udtm_pktSndLoss = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSndLoss", "I"); // number of lost packets (sender side)
00294         udtm_pktRcvLoss = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRcvLoss", "I"); // number of lost packets (receiverer side)
00295         udtm_pktRetrans = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRetrans", "I"); // number of retransmitted packets
00296         udtm_pktSentACK = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentACK", "I"); // number of sent ACK packets
00297         udtm_pktRecvACK = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvACK", "I"); // number of received ACK packets
00298         udtm_pktSentNAK = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktSentNAK", "I"); // number of sent NAK packets
00299         udtm_pktRecvNAK = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktRecvNAK", "I"); // number of received NAK packets
00300         udtm_mbpsSendRate = env->GetFieldID(cls, "mbpsSendRate", "D"); // sending rate in Mb/s
00301         udtm_mbpsRecvRate = env->GetFieldID(cls, "mbpsRecvRate", "D"); // receiving rate in Mb/s
00302         udtm_usSndDuration = env->GetFieldID(cls, "usSndDuration", "J"); // busy sending time (i.e., idle time exclusive)
00303 
00304         // instant measurements
00305         udtm_usPktSndPeriod = env->GetFieldID(cls, "usPktSndPeriod", "D"); // packet sending period, in microseconds
00306         udtm_pktFlowWindow = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktFlowWindow", "I"); // flow window size, in number of packets
00307         udtm_pktCongestionWindow = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktCongestionWindow", "I"); // congestion window size, in number of packets
00308         udtm_pktFlightSize = env->GetFieldID(cls, "pktFlightSize", "I"); // number of packets on flight
00309         udtm_msRTT = env->GetFieldID(cls, "msRTT", "D"); // RTT, in milliseconds

00363 
00364         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsInet4Address);

00366         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsInetSocketAddress);
00367 
00368         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsSocketException);
00369 
00370         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsSet);
00371         X_FreeClassReference(env, &jdk_clsIterator);
00372 
00373         // UDT
00374 
00375         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsSocketUDT);
00376         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsTypeUDT);
00377         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsFactoryUDT);
00378         X_FreeClassReference(env, &udt_clsMonitorUDT);

00385 void UDT_InitFieldRefAll(JNIEnv * const env) {
00386 
00387         // JDK
00388 
00389         ia_AddressID = env->GetFieldID(jdk_clsInet4Address, "address", "I");
00390 
00391         isa_InetAddressID = env->GetFieldID(jdk_clsInetSocketAddress, //
00392                         "addr", "Ljava/net/InetAddress;");
00393         isa_PortID = env->GetFieldID(jdk_clsInetSocketAddress, //
00394                         "port", "I");
00395 
00396         // UDT SocketUDT
00397 
00398         udts_SocketID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00399                         "socketID", "I");
00400         udts_RemoteSocketAddressID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00401                         "remoteSocketAddress", "Ljava/net/InetSocketAddress;");
00402         udts_LocalSocketAddressID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00403                         "localSocketAddress", "Ljava/net/InetSocketAddress;");
00404         udts_TypeID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00405                         "type", "Lcom/barchart/udt/TypeUDT;");
00406         udts_MonitorID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsSocketUDT, //
00407                         "monitor", "Lcom/barchart/udt/MonitorUDT;");
00408 
00409         // UDT TypeUDT
00410 
00411         udtt_TypeCodeID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsTypeUDT, "code", "I");
00412 
00413         // UDT MonitorUDT
00414 
00415         UDT_InitFieldMonitor(env);
00416 
00417         // UDT CCC
00418 
00419         udt_clsCCC_fld_nativeHandleID = env->GetFieldID(udt_clsCCC, //
00420                         "nativeHandle", "J");
00421 
00422 }

00502 /* signature is a monotonously increasing integer; set in java class SocketUDT */
00503 
00504 // validate consistency of java code and native library
00505 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_getSignatureJNI0( //
00506                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00507                 const jclass clsSocketUDT //
00508                 ) {
00509 
00510         UNUSED(env);
00511         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
00512 
00513         return com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_SIGNATURE_JNI;
00514 
00515 }

00517 // called on java class load
00518 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_initClass0( //
00519                 JNIEnv* const env, //
00520                 const jclass clsSocketUDT //
00521                 ) {
00522 
00523         UNUSED(env);
00524         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
00525 
00526         UDT_InitClassRefAll(env);
00527 
00528         UDT_InitFieldRefAll(env);
00529 
00530         UDT_InitMethodRefAll(env);
00531 
00532         const int rv = UDT::startup();
00533 
00534         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00535                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00536                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00537                                 env, 0, "initClass0:startup", &errorInfo);
00538                 return;
00539         }
00540 
00541 }

00571                 ) {

00584                 return JNI_ERR;

00611 JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_accept0( //
00612                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00613                 const jobject self //
00614                 ) {
00615 
00616         sockaddr remoteSockAddr;
00617         int remoteSockAddrSize = sizeof(remoteSockAddr);
00618 
00619         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00620 
00621         const jint socketACC = UDT::accept(socketID, &remoteSockAddr,
00622                         &remoteSockAddrSize);
00623 
00624         if (socketACC == UDT::INVALID_SOCK) {
00625 
00626                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00627 
00628                 const jint errorCode = errorInfo.getErrorCode();
00629 
00630                 if (errorCode == UDT::ERRORINFO::EASYNCRCV) {
00631                         // not a java exception: non-blocking mode return, when not connections in the queue
00632                 } else {
00633                         // really exception
00634                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00635                                         env, socketID, "accept0:accept", &errorInfo);
00636                 }
00637 
00638                 return NULL;
00639 
00640         }
00641 
00642         jobject objTypeUDT = env->GetObjectField(self, udts_TypeID);
00643 
00644         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objTypeUDT, "objTypeUDT");
00645 
00646         jobject objSocketUDT = env->NewObject(udt_clsSocketUDT,
00647                         udt_clsSocketUDT_initID1, objTypeUDT, socketACC);
00648 
00649         CHK_NUL_RET_NUL(objSocketUDT, "objSocketUDT");
00650 
00651         return objSocketUDT;
00652 
00653 }

00655 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_bind0( //
00656                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00657                 const jobject self, //
00658                 const jobject objLocalSocketAddress //
00659                 ) {
00660 
00661         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00662 
00663         int rv;
00664 
00665         sockaddr localSockAddr;
00666 
00667         rv = X_InitSockAddr(&localSockAddr);
00668 
00669         if (rv == JNI_ERR) {
00670                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID, "can not X_InitSockAddr");
00671                 return;
00672         }
00673 
00674         rv = X_ConvertInetSocketAddressToSockaddr(env, objLocalSocketAddress,
00675                         &localSockAddr);
00676 
00677         if (rv == JNI_ERR) {
00678                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00679                                 "can not X_ConvertInetSocketAddressToSockaddr");
00680                 return;
00681         }
00682 
00683         rv = UDT::bind(socketID, &localSockAddr, sizeof(localSockAddr));
00684 
00685         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00686                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00687                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00688                                 env, socketID, "bind0:bind", &errorInfo);
00689                 return;
00690         }
00691 
00692 }

00717                 ) {

00735                 return;

00739                         objRemoteSocketAddress, &remoteSockAddr);

00753                 return;

00758 JNIEXPORT jboolean JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_hasLoadedRemoteSocketAddress( //
00759                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00760                 const jobject self //
00761                 ) {
00762 
00763         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00764 
00765         sockaddr remoteSockAddr;
00766         int remoteSockAddrSize = sizeof(remoteSockAddr);
00767 
00768         // "peer" is remote
00769         const int rv = UDT::getpeername( //
00770                         socketID, &remoteSockAddr, &remoteSockAddrSize);
00771 
00772         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00773                 // no exceptions
00774                 return JNI_FALSE;
00775         }
00776 
00777         jobject objRemoteSocketAddress = env->GetObjectField(self,
00778                         udts_RemoteSocketAddressID);
00779 
00780         if (objRemoteSocketAddress == NULL
00781                         || !X_IsSockaddrEqualsInetSocketAddress(env, &remoteSockAddr,
00782                                         objRemoteSocketAddress)) {
00783 
00784                 objRemoteSocketAddress = X_NewInetSocketAddress(env, &remoteSockAddr);
00785 
00786                 env->SetObjectField(self, udts_RemoteSocketAddressID,
00787                                 objRemoteSocketAddress);
00788 
00789         }
00790 
00791         return JNI_TRUE;
00792 
00793 }
00794

00831 
00832 // struct that fits all UDT options types
00833 union UDT_OptVal {
00834         void* factory;
00835         linger lingerValue;
00836         int64_t longValue;
00837         int intValue;
00838         bool boolValue;
00839 };
00840 
00841 JNIEXPORT jobject JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_getOption0( //
00842                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00843                 const jobject self, //
00844                 const jint enumCode, //
00845                 const jclass klaz //
00846                 ) {
00847 
00848         UDT::SOCKOPT optionName = (UDT::SOCKOPT) enumCode;
00849         UDT_OptVal optionValue;
00850         int optionValueSize = sizeof(optionValue);
00851 
00852         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00853 
00854         const int rv = UDT::getsockopt( //
00855                         socketID, 0, optionName, (void*) &optionValue, &optionValueSize);
00856 
00857         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00858                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00859                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00860                                 env, socketID, "getOption0:getsockopt", &errorInfo);
00861                 return NULL;
00862         }
00863 
00864         if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsBoolean)) {
00865 
00866                 return X_NewBoolean(env, optionValue.boolValue);
00867 
00868         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsInteger)) {
00869 
00870                 return X_NewInteger(env, optionValue.intValue);
00871 
00872         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsLingerUDT)) {
00873 
00874                 return UDT_NewLingerUDT(env, &(optionValue.lingerValue));
00875 
00876         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsLong)) {
00877 
00878                 return X_NewLong(env, optionValue.longValue);
00879 
00880         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsFactoryUDT)) {
00881 
00882                 CCC* pCCC = reinterpret_cast<CCC*>(optionValue.factory);
00883 
00884                 //check to see if they type is as JNICCC class
00885                 JNICCC* pJNICCC = dynamic_cast<JNICCC*>(pCCC);
00886 
00887                 if (pJNICCC != NULL) {
00888                         //it is, so return the corresponding Java CCC (or derivative) class
00889                         return pJNICCC->getJavaCCC();
00890                 } else {
00891                         //it's a plain CCC class or standard C++ congestion
00892                         //control class so return NULL instead
00893                         return NULL;
00894                 }
00895 
00896         } else {
00897 
00898                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00899                                 "unsupported option class in OptionUDT");
00900 
00901                 return NULL;
00902         }
00903 
00904 }
00905 
00906 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_setOption0( //
00907                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00908                 const jobject self, //
00909                 const jint enumCode, //
00910                 const jclass klaz, //
00911                 const jobject objValue //
00912                 ) {
00913 
00914         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
00915 
00916         UDT::SOCKOPT optionName = (UDT::SOCKOPT) enumCode;
00917         UDT_OptVal optionValue;
00918         int optionValueSize = sizeof(optionValue);
00919 
00920         if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsBoolean)) {
00921 
00922                 jmethodID methodID = //
00923                                 env->GetMethodID(jdk_clsBoolean, "booleanValue", "()Z");
00924                 jboolean value = env->CallBooleanMethod(objValue, methodID);
00925 
00926                 optionValue.boolValue = BOOL(value);
00927                 optionValueSize = sizeof(bool);
00928 
00929         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsInteger)) {
00930 
00931                 jmethodID methodID = //
00932                                 env->GetMethodID(jdk_clsInteger, "intValue", "()I");
00933                 jint value = env->CallIntMethod(objValue, methodID);
00934 
00935                 optionValue.intValue = value;
00936                 optionValueSize = sizeof(int);
00937 
00938         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsLingerUDT)) {
00939 
00940                 jmethodID methodID = //
00941                                 env->GetMethodID(udt_clsLingerUDT, "intValue", "()I");
00942                 int value = env->CallIntMethod(objValue, methodID);
00943 
00944                 if (value <= 0) {
00945                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_onoff = 0;
00946                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_linger = 0;
00947                 } else {
00948                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_onoff = 1;
00949                         optionValue.lingerValue.l_linger = value; // msvc C4244
00950                 }
00951 
00952                 optionValueSize = sizeof(linger);
00953 
00954         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, jdk_clsLong)) {
00955 
00956                 jmethodID methodID = //
00957                                 env->GetMethodID(jdk_clsLong, "longValue", "()J");
00958                 jlong value = env->CallLongMethod(objValue, methodID);
00959 
00960                 optionValue.longValue = value;
00961                 optionValueSize = sizeof(int64_t);
00962 
00963         } else if (env->IsSameObject(klaz, udt_clsFactoryUDT)) {
00964 
00965                 optionValue.factory = new JNICCCFactory(env, objValue);
00966                 optionValueSize = sizeof(void*);
00967 
00968         } else {
00969 
00970                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
00971                                 "unsupported option class in OptionUDT");
00972 
00973                 return;
00974         }
00975 
00976         const int rv = UDT::setsockopt(socketID, 0, optionName,
00977                         (void*) (optionName == UDT_CC ? optionValue.factory : &optionValue),
00978                         optionValueSize);
00979 
00980         if (optionName == UDT_CC && optionValue.factory != NULL) {
00981                 delete reinterpret_cast<JNICCCFactory*>(optionValue.factory);
00982         }
00983 
00984         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
00985                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
00986                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
00987                                 env, socketID, "setOption0:setsockopt", &errorInfo);
00988                 return;
00989         }
00990 
00991 }
00992 
00993 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_listen0( //
00994                 JNIEnv * const env, //
00995                 const jobject self, //
00996                 const jint queueSize //
00997                 ) {

01000

01002

01004                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();

01011 
01012 // #########################################################################
01013 
01014 bool X_IsValidRange( //
01015                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01016                 const jint socketID, //
01017                 const jlong position, //
01018                 const jlong limit, //
01019                 const jlong capacity //
01020                 ) {
01021         if (!X_IsInRange(0, position, capacity)) {
01022                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message( //
01023                                 env, socketID, "position is out of range");
01024                 return false;
01025         }
01026         if (!X_IsInRange(0, limit, capacity)) {
01027                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message( //
01028                                 env, socketID, "limit is out of range");
01029                 return false;
01030         }
01031         if (position > limit) {
01032                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message( //
01033                                 env, socketID, "position > limit");
01034                 return false;
01035         }
01036         return true;
01037 }
01038 
01039 // #######################################################################
01040 
01041 /*
01042  * receiveX call is shared for both receive() and receivemsg()
01043  */
01044 
01045 // return values, if exception is NOT thrown
01046 // -1 : nothing received (non-blocking only)
01047 // =0 : timeout expired (blocking only)
01048 // >0 : normal receive
01049 jint UDT_ReturnReceiveError( //
01050                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01051                 const jint socketID //
01052                 ) {
01053         UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01054         const int errorCode = errorInfo.getErrorCode();
01055         if (errorCode == UDT::ERRORINFO::EASYNCRCV) {
01056                 // not a java exception: non-blocking mode return when nothing is received
01057         } else {
01058                 // really exception
01059                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01060                                 env, socketID, "recv/recvmsg", &errorInfo);
01061         }
01062         return JNI_ERR;
01063 }
01064 
01065 // receive into complete array
01066 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receive0( //
01067                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01068                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01069                 const jint socketID, //
01070                 const jint socketType, //
01071                 const jbyteArray arrayObj //
01072                 ) {
01073 
01074         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01075 
01076         jboolean isCopy; // whether JVM returns a reference or a copy
01077 
01078         jbyte * const data = env->GetByteArrayElements(arrayObj, &isCopy); // note: must release
01079 
01080         const jsize size = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01081 
01082         int rv;
01083 
01084         switch (socketType) {
01085         case SOCK_STREAM:
01086                 rv = UDT::recv(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01087                 break;
01088         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01089                 rv = UDT::recvmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size);
01090                 break;
01091         default:
01092                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); // do not copy back
01093                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01094                                 "recv/recvmsg : unexpected socketType");
01095                 return JNI_ERR;
01096         }
01097 
01098         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01099                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_UPDATE); //
01100                 return rv;
01101         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01102                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); //
01103                 return UDT_ReturnReceiveError(env, socketID);
01104         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01105                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); //
01106                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01107         }
01108 
01109 }
01110 
01111 // receive into a portion of an array
01112 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receive1( //
01113                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01114                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01115                 const jint socketID, //
01116                 const jint socketType, //
01117                 const jbyteArray arrayObj, //
01118                 const jint position, //
01119                 const jint limit //
01120                 ) {
01121 
01122         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01123 
01124         const jsize capacity = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01125 
01126         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01127                 return JNI_ERR;
01128         }
01129 
01130         const jsize size = limit - position;
01131 
01132         jbyte * const data = (jbyte *) malloc(sizeof(jbyte) * size);
01133 
01134         if (data == NULL) {
01135                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01136                                 "recv/recvmsg : can not allocate data array");
01137                 return JNI_ERR;
01138         }
01139 
01140         int rv;
01141 
01142         switch (socketType) {
01143         case SOCK_STREAM:
01144                 rv = UDT::recv(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01145                 break;
01146         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01147                 rv = UDT::recvmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size);
01148                 break;
01149         default:
01150                 free(data);
01151                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01152                                 "recv/recvmsg : unexpected socketType");
01153                 return JNI_ERR;
01154         }
01155 
01156         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01157                 env->SetByteArrayRegion(arrayObj, position, rv, data);
01158                 free(data);
01159                 return rv;
01160         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01161                 free(data);
01162                 return UDT_ReturnReceiveError(env, socketID);
01163         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01164                 free(data);
01165                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01166         }
01167 
01168 }
01169 
01170 // receive into direct byte buffer
01171 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receive2( //
01172                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01173                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01174                 const jint socketID, //
01175                 const jint socketType, //
01176                 const jobject bufferObj, //
01177                 const jint position, //
01178                 const jint limit //
01179                 ) {
01180 
01181         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01182 
01183         const jlong capacity = env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(bufferObj);
01184 
01185         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01186                 return JNI_ERR;
01187         }
01188 
01189         const jbyte * bufferAddress = //
01190                         static_cast<jbyte*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(bufferObj));
01191 
01192         const jbyte * data = bufferAddress + position;
01193         const jsize size = static_cast<jsize>(limit - position);
01194 
01195         // memory boundary test
01196         // assert(data[0] | 1);
01197         // assert(data[size - 1] | 1);
01198 
01199         int rv;
01200 
01201         switch (socketType) {
01202         case SOCK_STREAM:
01203                 rv = UDT::recv(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01204                 break;
01205         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01206                 rv = UDT::recvmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size);
01207                 break;
01208         default:
01209                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01210                                 "recv/recvmsg : unexpected socketType");
01211                 return JNI_ERR;
01212         }
01213 
01214         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01215                 return rv;
01216         } else if (rv < 0) { //  UDT::ERROR
01217                 return UDT_ReturnReceiveError(env, socketID);
01218         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01219                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01220         }
01221 
01222 }
01223 
01224 JNIEXPORT jlong JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_receiveFile0(
01225                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01226                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01227                 const jint socketID, //
01228                 const jstring path, //
01229                 const jlong offset, //
01230                 const jlong length, //
01231                 const jint block //
01232                 ) {
01233 
01234         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01235 
01236         const char * filePath = env->GetStringUTFChars(path, NULL);
01237         int64_t fileOffset = static_cast<int64_t>(offset);
01238         int64_t fileLength = static_cast<int64_t>(length);
01239         int fileBlock = static_cast<int>(block);
01240 
01241         const int64_t rv = UDT::recvfile2( //
01242                         socketID, filePath, &fileOffset, fileLength, fileBlock);
01243 
01244         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
01245                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01246                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01247                                 env, socketID, "receiveFile0:recvfile2", &errorInfo);
01248                 return JNI_ERR;
01249         }
01250 
01251         return static_cast<jlong>(rv);
01252 
01253 }
01254 
01255 // return values, if exception is NOT thrown
01256 // -1 : no buffer space (non-blocking only )
01257 // =0 : timeout expired (blocking only)
01258 // >0 : normal send, byte count
01259 jint UDT_ReturnSendError( //
01260                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01261                 const jint socketID //
01262                 ) {
01263         UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01264         const int errorCode = errorInfo.getErrorCode();
01265         if (errorCode == UDT::ERRORINFO::EASYNCSND) {
01266                 // not a java exception: non-blocking mode return when no space in UDT buffer
01267         } else {
01268                 // really exception
01269                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01270                                 env, socketID, "send/sendmsg", &errorInfo);
01271         }
01272         return JNI_ERR;
01273 }
01274 
01275 // send from complete array
01276 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_send0( //
01277                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01278                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01279                 const jint socketID, //
01280                 const jint socketType, //
01281                 const jint timeToLive, //
01282                 const jboolean isOrdered, //
01283                 const jbyteArray arrayObj //
01284                 ) {
01285 
01286         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01287 
01288         jboolean isCopy; // whether JVM returned reference or copy
01289 
01290         jbyte * const data = env->GetByteArrayElements(arrayObj, &isCopy); // note: must release
01291 
01292         const jsize size = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01293 
01294         int rv;
01295 
01296         switch (socketType) {
01297         case SOCK_STREAM:
01298                 rv = UDT::send(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01299                 break;
01300         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01301                 rv = UDT::sendmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, (int) timeToLive,
01302                                 BOOL(isOrdered));
01303                 break;
01304         default:
01305                 env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); // do not copy back
01306                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01307                                 "send/sendmsg : unexpected socketType");
01308                 return JNI_ERR;
01309         }
01310 
01311         env->ReleaseByteArrayElements(arrayObj, data, JNI_ABORT); // do not copy back
01312 
01313         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01314                 return rv;
01315         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01316                 return UDT_ReturnSendError(env, socketID);
01317         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01318                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01319         }
01320 
01321 }
01322 
01323 // send from a portion of array
01324 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_send1( //
01325                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01326                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01327                 const jint socketID, //
01328                 const jint socketType, //
01329                 const jint timeToLive, //
01330                 const jboolean isOrdered, //
01331                 const jbyteArray arrayObj, //
01332                 const jint position, //
01333                 const jint limit //
01334                 ) {
01335 
01336         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01337 
01338         const jsize capacity = env->GetArrayLength(arrayObj);
01339 
01340         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01341                 return JNI_ERR;
01342         }
01343 
01344         const jsize size = limit - position;
01345 
01346         jbyte * const data = (jbyte *) malloc(sizeof(jbyte) * size);
01347 
01348         if (data == NULL) {
01349                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01350                                 "send/sendmsg : can not allocate data array");
01351                 return JNI_ERR;
01352         }
01353 
01354         env->GetByteArrayRegion(arrayObj, position, size, data);
01355 
01356         int rv;
01357 
01358         switch (socketType) {
01359         case SOCK_STREAM:
01360                 rv = UDT::send(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01361                 break;
01362         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01363                 rv = UDT::sendmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, (int) timeToLive,
01364                                 BOOL(isOrdered));
01365                 break;
01366         default:
01367                 free(data);
01368                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01369                                 "send/sendmsg : unexpected socketType");
01370                 return JNI_ERR;
01371         }
01372 
01373         free(data);
01374 
01375         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01376                 return rv;
01377         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01378                 return UDT_ReturnSendError(env, socketID);
01379         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01380                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01381         }
01382 
01383 }
01384 
01385 // send direct byte buffer
01386 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_send2( //
01387                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01388                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01389                 const jint socketID, //
01390                 const jint socketType, //
01391                 const jint timeToLive, //
01392                 const jboolean isOrdered, //
01393                 const jobject bufferObj, //
01394                 const jint position, //
01395                 const jint limit //
01396                 ) {
01397 
01398         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01399 
01400         const jbyte* address = //
01401                         static_cast<jbyte*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(bufferObj));
01402         const jlong capacity = env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(bufferObj);
01403 
01404         if (!X_IsValidRange(env, socketID, position, limit, capacity)) {
01405                 return JNI_ERR;
01406         }
01407 
01408         const jbyte* data = address + position;
01409         const jsize size = static_cast<jsize>(limit - position);
01410 
01411         // memory boundary test
01412         // assert(data[0] | 1);
01413         // assert(data[size - 1] | 1);
01414 
01415         int rv;
01416 
01417         switch (socketType) {
01418         case SOCK_STREAM:
01419                 rv = UDT::send(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, 0);
01420                 break;
01421         case SOCK_DGRAM:
01422                 rv = UDT::sendmsg(socketID, (char*) data, (int) size, (int) timeToLive,
01423                                 BOOL(isOrdered));
01424                 break;
01425         default:
01426                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, socketID,
01427                                 "send/sendmsg : unexpected socketType");
01428                 return JNI_ERR;
01429         }
01430 
01431         if (rv > 0) { // normal
01432                 return rv;
01433         } else if (rv < 0) { // UDT::ERROR
01434                 return UDT_ReturnSendError(env, socketID);
01435         } else { // ==0; UDT_TIMEOUT
01436                 return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01437         }
01438 
01439 }

01511 JNIEXPORT void JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_updateMonitor0( //
01512                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01513                 const jobject self, //
01514                 const jboolean makeClear //
01515                 ) {
01516 
01517         UDT::TRACEINFO monitor;
01518 
01519         const jint socketID = UDT_GetSocketID(env, self);
01520 
01521         const int rv = UDT::perfmon(socketID, &monitor, BOOL(makeClear));
01522 
01523         if (rv == UDT::ERROR) {
01524                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01525                 UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01526                                 env, socketID, "updateMonitor0:perfmon", &errorInfo);
01527                 return;
01528         }
01529 
01530         const jobject objMonitor = env->GetObjectField(self, udts_MonitorID);
01531 
01532         CHK_NUL_RET_RET(objMonitor, "objMonitor");
01533 
01534         // global measurements
01535         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_msTimeStamp, monitor.msTimeStamp); // time since the UDT entity is started, in milliseconds
01536         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentTotal, monitor.pktSentTotal); // total number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
01537         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvTotal, monitor.pktRecvTotal); // total number of received packets
01538         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSndLossTotal, monitor.pktSndLossTotal); // total number of lost packets (sender side)
01539         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRcvLossTotal, monitor.pktRcvLossTotal); // total number of lost packets (receiver side)
01540         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRetransTotal, monitor.pktRetransTotal); // total number of retransmitted packets
01541         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentACKTotal, monitor.pktSentACKTotal); // total number of sent ACK packets
01542         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvACKTotal, monitor.pktRecvACKTotal); // total number of received ACK packets
01543         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentNAKTotal, monitor.pktSentNAKTotal); // total number of sent NAK packets
01544         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvNAKTotal, monitor.pktRecvNAKTotal); // total number of received NAK packets
01545         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_usSndDurationTotal,
01546                         monitor.usSndDurationTotal); // total time duration when UDT is sending data (idle time exclusive)
01547 
01548         // local measurements
01549         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSent, monitor.pktSent); // number of sent data packets, including retransmissions
01550         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecv, monitor.pktRecv); // number of received packets
01551         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSndLoss, monitor.pktSndLoss); // number of lost packets (sender side)
01552         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRcvLoss, monitor.pktRcvLoss); // number of lost packets (receiverer side)
01553         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRetrans, monitor.pktRetrans); // number of retransmitted packets
01554         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentACK, monitor.pktSentACK); // number of sent ACK packets
01555         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvACK, monitor.pktRecvACK); // number of received ACK packets
01556         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktSentNAK, monitor.pktSentNAK); // number of sent NAK packets
01557         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktRecvNAK, monitor.pktRecvNAK); // number of received NAK packets
01558         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_mbpsSendRate, monitor.mbpsSendRate); // sending rate in Mb/s
01559         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_mbpsRecvRate, monitor.mbpsRecvRate); // receiving rate in Mb/s
01560         env->SetLongField(objMonitor, udtm_usSndDuration, monitor.usSndDuration); // busy sending time (i.e., idle time exclusive)
01561 
01562         // instant measurements
01563         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_usPktSndPeriod,
01564                         monitor.usPktSndPeriod); // packet sending period, in microseconds
01565         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktFlowWindow, monitor.pktFlowWindow); // flow window size, in number of packets
01566         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktCongestionWindow,
01567                         monitor.pktCongestionWindow); // congestion window size, in number of packets
01568         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_pktFlightSize, monitor.pktFlightSize); // number of packets on flight
01569         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_msRTT, monitor.msRTT); // RTT, in milliseconds
01570         env->SetDoubleField(objMonitor, udtm_mbpsBandwidth, monitor.mbpsBandwidth); // estimated bandwidth, in Mb/s
01571         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_byteAvailSndBuf, monitor.byteAvailSndBuf); // available UDT sender buffer size
01572         env->SetIntField(objMonitor, udtm_byteAvailRcvBuf, monitor.byteAvailRcvBuf); // available UDT receiver buffer size
01573 
01574 }

01577 
01578 void UDT_CopyArrayToSet(jint* array, set<UDTSOCKET>* udSet, const jsize size) {
01579         for (jint index = 0; index < size; index++) {
01580                 const jint socketID = array[index];
01581                 udSet->insert(socketID);
01582         }
01583 }
01584 
01585 void UDT_CopySetToArray(set<UDTSOCKET>* udSet, jint* array, const jsize size) {
01586         set<UDTSOCKET>::iterator iterator = udSet->begin();
01587         for (jint index = 0; index < size; index++) {
01588                 const jint socketID = *iterator;
01589                 array[index] = socketID;
01590                 ++iterator;
01591         }
01592 }

01597 #define UDT_SIZE_COUNT          com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_UDT_SIZE_COUNT
01598 #define UDT_SELECT_LIMIT        com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_DEFAULT_MAX_SELECTOR_SIZE

01745 
01746 JNIEXPORT jint JNICALL Java_com_barchart_udt_SocketUDT_epollWait0( //
01747                 JNIEnv * const env, //
01748                 const jclass clsSocketUDT, //
01749                 const jint pollID, //
01750                 const jobject objReadBuffer, //
01751                 const jobject objWriteBuffer, //
01752                 const jobject objSizeBuffer, //
01753                 const jlong millisTimeout //
01754                 ) {
01755 
01756         UNUSED(clsSocketUDT);
01757 
01758         // readiness sets
01759         set<UDTSOCKET> readSet;
01760         set<UDTSOCKET> writeSet;
01761 
01762         // readiness report
01763         const int rv = UDT::epoll_wait( //
01764                         pollID, &readSet, &writeSet, millisTimeout, NULL, NULL);
01765 
01766         // readiness reports size array
01767         jint* const sizeArray = //
01768                         static_cast<jint*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(objSizeBuffer));
01769 
01770         // process timeout & errors
01771         if (rv <= 0) { // UDT::ERROR is '-1'
01772                 UDT::ERRORINFO errorInfo = UDT::getlasterror();
01773                 if (errorInfo.getErrorCode() == UDT::ERRORINFO::ETIMEOUT) {
01774                         // not a java exception:
01775                         sizeArray[UDT_READ_INDEX] = 0;
01776                         sizeArray[UDT_WRITE_INDEX] = 0;
01777                         sizeArray[UDT_EXCEPT_INDEX] = 0;
01778                         return UDT_TIMEOUT;
01779                 } else {
01780                         // really exception
01781                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_ErrorInfo( //
01782                                         env, 0, "epollWait0:epoll_wait", &errorInfo);
01783                         return JNI_ERR;
01784                 }
01785         }
01786 
01787         // return read interest
01788         const jsize readSize = readSet.size();
01789         sizeArray[UDT_READ_INDEX] = readSize;
01790         if (readSize > 0) {
01791                 if (readSize > env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(objReadBuffer)) {
01792                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, 0,
01793                                         "readSize > objReadBuffer capacity");
01794                         return JNI_ERR;
01795                 }
01796                 jint* const readArray = //
01797                                 static_cast<jint*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(objReadBuffer));
01798                 UDT_CopySetToArray(&readSet, readArray, readSize);
01799         }
01800 
01801         // return write interest
01802         const jsize writeSize = writeSet.size();
01803         sizeArray[UDT_WRITE_INDEX] = writeSize;
01804         if (writeSize > 0) {
01805                 if (writeSize > env->GetDirectBufferCapacity(objWriteBuffer)) {
01806                         UDT_ThrowExceptionUDT_Message(env, 0,
01807                                         "writeSize > objWriteBuffer capacity");
01808                         return JNI_ERR;
01809                 }
01810                 jint* const writeArray = //
01811                                 static_cast<jint*>(env->GetDirectBufferAddress(objWriteBuffer));
01812                 UDT_CopySetToArray(&writeSet, writeArray, writeSize);
01813         }
01814 
01815         return rv;
01816 
01817 }
